title: Just learned that Morde's ult even blocks Triumph/PoM particles
body:
As in, you and your _allied_ Morde are battling enemies, and then your _allied_ Morde ults one of those enemies, and then kills that enemy in the Death Realm. And the Triumph/PoM particles, carrying your health and gold or mana and ult CD, fizzle in the Death Realm.

I think that's just a bit much, but I guess I should be thankful that actual assist gold and credit don't get lost like that. It's just... that's harsh, y'know.

replies.body: Whole morde rework is rigged for me, with overtuned kit.
how such a basic kit is overtuned?

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tEsLO1Lr,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-26T16:29:12.438+0000)
>
> Overtuned =/= Overloaded

Hes a good champion but hes not over tuned. His win rate and ban rate have steadily gone down as people figure him out and he is now showing stats mirroring other good top lane champions.

What's funnier, although not much abusable, is that If you ult one guy that can't do shit against you while backdooring you can have intimate time with Nexus for 7 seconds. Only the one guy can try to stop you while you are melting the Nexus down. Slightly funny tbh.
I wish you could TP out of the realm. {{champion:35}}
It's a bit like Poppies old ult.
